imdb.plot outline: Aging in the Wild is a five-part series that takes a never-before seen look at the golden years in the animal kingdom. Against the extraordinary backdrop of some of the world's most magnificent nature reserves, national parks, and wilderness areas this series brings viewers on an unforgettable journey around the globe to meet some of nature's most interesting elders.
imdb.title: Aging in the Wild
plot: _Aging in the Wild_ (qv) is a five-part series that takes a never-before seen look at the golden years in the animal kingdom. Against the extraordinary backdrop of some of the world's most magnificent nature reserves, national parks, and wilderness areas this series brings viewers on an unforgettable journey around the globe to meet some of nature's most interesting elders.::Rotating Planet Productions
